questions.question: The signal is said to be 'stuck at fault' when it is stuck at logic  _____________ .
In a multiplexer, the selection of a particular input line is controlled by  _____________ .

answers.d: Both data controller and selected lines

questions.question: Which of the following is a combinational logic circuit designed to switch one of several input lines to a single common out put line?
Which of the following statement is correct?

answers.a: A 4*1 multiplexer has 4 input lines and 1 output line.
answers.b: A 4*1 multiplexer has 4 output lines, 2selection lines and 1 input line.
answers.c: A 4*1 multiplexer has 4 selection lines, 1 output line and 1 input line.
answers.d: A 4*1 multiplexer has 4 output lines, 1 selection line and 4 input lines.
